Entries.Event.cs.1068: Nurse Maru charged me {0}g for the hospital visit.
Entries.Event.cs.1070: I have no money, but Maru was obligated to save my life free of charge.

Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You were passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^I've billed you {0}g to cover your medical expenses.^^-Maru[#]From Maru, at the Clinic
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Someone dropped you off at the clinic last night. You were passed out from exhaustion!^You've got to take better care of yourself and go to bed at a reasonable hour.^Although you had no money, I provided your medical care free of charge.^^-Maru[#]Maru' Free Medical Service
